pageBody.p: Social Learning Space @ Abertay provides new students and students coming from college with resources and information for coming to university.
You will find various SLS projects below, free software and links to online resources on our Facebook Page and updates on events and information via our Twitter feed.

project.name: Access2
project.description: Access2 provides online refresher courses aimed at candidates for direct entry as well as registered students.

project.name: SLS Board
project.description: The SLS board is a notice board where students can post notifications and communicate with each other.

project.name: Graduate Attributes Wizard
project.description: The Graduate Attributes Wizard is a tool that makes it easy for you to create your own Graduate Attribute summary.

project.name: EduTweet
project.description: EduTweet is an educational search engine that uses Twitter.

project.name: AcademicScreenShare
project.description: The intention of the academic screen share project is to help you select web based resources that can support small group tasks within a large class setting.

hotlink.name: FileZilla
hotlink.description: FileZilla Client is a fast and reliable cross-platform FTP, FTPS and SFTP client with lots of useful features and an intuitive graphical user interface.

hotlink.name: Brackets
hotlink.description: Brackets is an open source code editor for web designers and front-end developers.

hotlink.name: jEdit
hotlink.description: jEdit is a mature programmer's text editor with hundreds (counting the time developing plugins) of person-years of development behind it.

hotlink.name: Open Office
hotlink.description: Apache OpenOffice is the leading open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, graphics, databases and more.

hotlink.name: DropBox
hotlink.description: DropBox is an online file storage service which can also be synced to your home computer and mobile devices.

hotlink.name: GIMP
hotlink.description: GIMP is the GNU Image Manipulation Program. It is a freely distributed piece of software for such tasks as photo retouching, image composition and image authoring. It works on many operating systems, in many languages.

hotlink.name: Inkscape
hotlink.description: An Open Source vector graphics editor, with capabilities similar to Illustrator, CorelDraw, or Xara X, using the W3C standard Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) file format.

hotlink.name: MySQL Workbench
hotlink.description: MySQL Workbench is a unified visual tool for database architects, developers, and DBAs. MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, backup, and much more. MySQL Workbench is available on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.
